long_description: Gather your friends and get on the road! The Kelty Tailgater IPA shelter is designed to provide quick and easy shelter off the back of your full- or mid-size SUV or wagon. Tailgater IPA shelter sets up in a snap for portable sun and rain protection at the campsite or tailgate party; it's the perfect road trip companion. Closable mesh side windows add some privacy while an open back allows easy access; noiseless zipper pulls offer peace of mind. Color-coded clip construction makes setup simple. Main poles are wrapped fiberglass and ridge pole is DAC(R) Hybrid steel (steel tube with aluminum ferrule), offering a good mix of flexibility and rigidity. Taped seams ensure excellent weather protection. Internal storage pockets keeps small stuff organized. Guyout points help secure the Kelty Tailgater IPA shelter in windy weather; guylines have their own storage pocket so they don't get lost. Envelope-style carry bag holds canopy on 1 side and poles/stakes on the other; stakes and guylines are included. Please note: Tailgater IPA works with vehicles with a factory or aftermarket roof rack and with back doors that open either up (hatchback) or up/down (tailgate). Please note: if using the Tailgater IPA shelter in a parking lot, you will need sandbags, not included.
short_description: Gather your friends and get on the road! The Kelty Tailgater IPA shelter is designed to provide quick and easy shelter off the back of your full- or mid-size SUV or wagon.
